cascade.text: afp reports there are 2 dead, and 5 hostages being held in the kosher store in eastern paris; separate incident to charlie hebdo shooters.
@ShirazMaher @intelwire Not so much separated. There're links between them.
@JeromePio @intelwire meant it in the sense that it's different person/people. Links between them unclear at the moment, lots of rumours.
@ShirazMaher @NickKristof no dead ! cf @Place_Beauvau
@ShirazMaher @JeromePio A lot of shifting sands in the coverage right now. We'll know soon enough.
@ShirazMaher @JeromePio Speaking of https://t.co/lCQ0qFyePh

@ShirazMaher @NickKristof what a shocker..
@ShirazMaher @DimaV Yes there is a link. It was confirmed officially today.
@intelwire @ShirazMaher @JeromePio Yes lots of mixed info coming out. Anyone else here about potential 08 prison connection btwn planners?
@ShirazMaher so what happen to the Charlie hebbdo suspects man news coverage is so shifty in this story
@cldaymon @intelwire @ShirazMaher Previous connections about plot to freed a terrorist involved in 1995 Paris attack. Otherwise not yet.
@rachelfromohio @ShirazMaher Officials have apparently confirmed that the deli is linked to #CharlieHebdo & killing of officer.
@JeromePio Thanks 4 the clarification. Many ideas being floated by the media right now. Wish they wouldn't do this. @intelwire @ShirazMaher
@cldaymon @intelwire @ShirazMaher Honestly, we need to wait official statement and investigations. By now, we all talk about rumors. :)
@JeromePio Agreed. As we say here in the States, "hold your horses". Lol! @intelwire @ShirazMaher
@ShirazMaher @NickKristof It is a separate incident but the same #terrorist cell?
@ShirazMaher @NickKristof Are moderate #Muslims protesting these acts of murder and violence?
@vanemaya @NickKristof That's what the police are saying. I meant 'separate' as in different guys to the ones that did Charlie Hebdo attack.
@ShirazMaher Thank you, Shiraz. I understand. What do you each think about all this? What is your reaction? @NickKristof
@vanemaya I think we don't have enough facts about the big picture right now (AQAP/ISIS etc), we'll need to wait and see  @NickKristof
@ShirazMaher @NickKristof ok. I would like to hear your reactions, your personal thoughts, once you have had time to process these events.
